findings.title: Maximum mint amount for Private and Public Sales do not match the intended design
findings.description: The maximum mint limit for private and public sales does not match the intended design, leading to an unwanted scenario where users can mint less than they could.

findings.title: Strict Equality should be avoided in Require Statements
findings.description: The GoingApeSigVerifyNft contract includes a few functions where the require statements contain a strict equality check that ensures that the msg.value being passed during the transaction is exactly equal to purchase amount.

findings.title: Violation of Check_Effects_Interaction Pattern in the Mint functions
findings.description: The GoingApeSigVerifyNft contract includes a few functions that update some of the very imperative state variables of the contract after the external calls are being made, violating the Check-Effects-Interaction pattern.

findings.title: No Events emitted after imperative State Variable modification
findings.description: Functions that update an imperative arithmetic state variable contract should emit an event after the state modification.
